mType.description: What type of schematic is this.

mDisplayName.description: The name to be displayed to the player

mSchematicCategory.description: The category this schematic belongs to.

mSubCategories.description: The sub categories this schematic belongs to.

mTechTier.description: The tech tier that this Schematic belongs to. [0...N]

mTimeToComplete.description: When we acquire this schematic how long does it take for it to complete its actions

mUnlocks.description: The unlocks you get when purchasing

mSchematicIcon.description: Icon used when displaying this schematic

mDependsOnSchematic.description: Is this schematic dependant on any other for being unlocked?

mAdditionalSchematicDependencies.description: Additional list of schematics for more specific dependency checking

mSchematicCategoryDeprecated.description: The category this schematic belongs to.

mAssetBundleData.description: Asset Bundle data computed at save time. In cooked builds this is accessible from AssetRegistry

mIncludeInBuilds.description: Slightly misleading name, as this doesn't only apply to builds. If set to Never, it won't show up in editor
